They are available on Spotify and purchasable through iTunes and Apple Music.[1] The soundtrack of The Dragon Prince is composed by Emmy...
data.text:
The Dragon Prince currently features four soundtrack albums and an exclusive vinyl record, including various background music of the Netflix series. They are available on Spotify and purchasable through iTunes and Apple Music.[1]

Information[]

The soundtrack of The Dragon Prince is composed by Emmy Award-winning German composer Frederik Wiedmann. In discussing the composition of music for the program's third season, he stated that he took the show's music in new directions based on the characters becoming braver and more courageous, and also based on the program's new romance element. He used a Celtic fiddle as a representative instrument for Rayla and a cello for King Harrow. Asked to name one track that he felt would best represent the entire series, he suggested "Leap" from the third season.[2]

Trivia[]

The official trailer for Season 4 uses Stuart Roslyn's and Matt Foundling's track "Look to the Sky" from the album "Burn Point" as theme music.
